results.content:
It was not even worth the time I spent writing this review. Seriously, DO NOT BUY this course! Please, KEEP READING this review if you want to know more!

All I've had so far is a list of a guy talking over a static video. Do I get to do anything but listen? It's awful listening to a guy JUST reading a Powerpoint presentation video after video, not mentioning the same annoying opening and ending song that "explodes" your headset! The author just touches things but doesn't really explain at all, disappointing...

This course is the worst I have taken. I'd give zero stars if it were possible. Unengaging, unpassionate and not worth the money or the time. Luckily I got this course for free some time ago, also not mentioning the low video quality in some videos.

results.content: Very engaging presentation. Presenter gives lots of context to make the material easier to absorb.
results.content_html: Very engaging presentation. Presenter gives lots of context to make the material easier to absorb.

results.content: Azat is a great instructor. He teaches clearly and goes directly to the point. He's got fully domain of NodeJS and ExpressJS.
results.content_html: Azat is a great instructor. He teaches clearly and goes directly to the point. He's got fully domain of NodeJS and ExpressJS.

results.content: Good start for express.js. A little bit basic but grealy recommended
results.content_html: Good start for express.js. A little bit basic but grealy recommended

results.content: it is good , but explain with examples it can understand easily. and your explanation is little bit fast, then it is very hard to understand for new learners.
results.content_html: it is good , but explain with examples it can understand easily. and your explanation is little bit fast, then it is very hard to understand for new learners.

results.content: pace is a bit too slow for me. the author takes time to explain things in too much detail. I wish the information would be stated only once as clearly as possible and not repeated. the egghead course on getting started with redux is exemplary in this regard.

results.content: Not much explained, the author just touches things but doesn 't really explain at all, disappointed

results.content: Clear explanation and engaging workshop mechanism to practice with.
results.content_html: Clear explanation and engaging workshop mechanism to practice with.

results.content: Azat is able to effectivly break down the process into building an express app into manageble tasks.  I highly recommend any of Azats courses
